name: Unfinished Fence simulator
description:
For Curdle Jam #8,  but wasn't able to fork over enough time for the goal.

You can walk around and place fences (Left Mouse / E) and place turrets (rightmouse/q). Bugs will spawn, and try to kill the random cube.

Planned Features:

-Turrets kill termites

-Cube produces materials to build more turrets and fences

-Title Screen

-Wave Progression

-Upgrading Cube
